title: how to put a image gif in thread

replies.body: http://i.imgur.com/hrYQS5h.gif    so now it should appear i hope

Just paste the image link to your post!  

Like dis

http://i.imgur.com/Y3ibubf.jpg

It won't show in your preview, but it will load once you post it.

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/73/8a/3d/738a3d453ccc87043fc6b044d1d77287.jpg

http://static.boredpanda.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/58c64a00e2531_Y3ibubf__605.jpg

There's also a great [Formatting 101](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/YHPBc6k3-board-formatting-101) for the boards that might help!  



Update:  Oh no, it's not loading!  It looks non imgur links are not loading.
cant thx you enough for the help .{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
so i copy the link adress thx .
well i really sck at those thing i guess . {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} if you could make it with step by step it could really help me no joke .
i tried copy link adress by right click the image and nothing happen do i need to put it in the attachment or something like this ?
The boards doesn't have an attachment feature.  You'll have to upload your picture to a website like [Imgur](http://imgur.com/), then use the site's unique link to paste it into your thread.
omg thx and one more question why it only move when you click on the image but not automatically without clicking the image and it is possible to put a GIF into a GIF ?
